title: Prime minister Rishi Sunak 'does not eat on Mondays' because of intermittent fasting, friend says
description: Rishi Sunak's friend has revealed the prime minister does not eat on Mondays as part of an intermittent fasting practice. A source disclosed the 43-year-old will have stopped eating by 5pm on a Sunday and is not allowed to touch food again until 5am on a Tuesday. During this period he allows himself to drink only black coffee and water.

description: Ian Blackford has insisted Nicola Sturgeon and Humza Yousaf are trusted by the public as a poll found Labour had surged to its biggest lead over the SNP for a decade. Research by Nostat put Labour on 36 per cent, up three points since its last poll in October, with the SNP on 33 per cent, down four points.
